title: The impact of face masks on face-to-face neural tracking of speech: Auditory and visual obstacles
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): M. Fantoni, A. Federici, I. Camponogara, G. Handjaras, A. Martinelli, E. Bednaya, E. Ricciardi, F. Pavani, D. Bottari
